entry.title: Turkey Votes in Runoff After Erdogan Takes First-Round Lead
entry.content: Millions of people are heading to the polls in a presidential runoff election that could cement President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s grip on power and his country’s influence in the war in Ukraine, the Middle East and NATO.

entry.title: Russia Launches Largest Drone Attack on Kyiv Since Start of War
entry.content: Depleting Ukraine’s air-defense stocks could be an attempt to increase the effectiveness of Russia’s future cruise-missile attacks, defense experts said.

entry.title: In a Small California City, Nearly Half the Police Included in Racist Text Threads
entry.content: For at least four years, officers in Antioch called Black residents racial slurs, bragged about beating suspects and joked about violating people’s rights.
